com.netflix.nicobar.core.module.jboss

Class JBossModuleClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.jboss.modules.ConcurrentClassLoader
        • org.jboss.modules.ModuleClassLoader
          • com.netflix.nicobar.core.module.jboss.JBossModuleClassLoader

  • public class JBossModuleClassLoader
extends org.jboss.modules.ModuleClassLoader
    base implementation of ModuleClassLoaders for this library Holds a ScriptArchive and adds simple life-cycle hooks adds a post-construction hook to inject classes into the classloader

    • Method Detail

      • createFactory

        protected static org.jboss.modules.ModuleClassLoaderFactory createFactory(ScriptArchive scriptArchive)
        Creates a ModuleClassLoaderFactory that produces a JBossModuleClassLoader. This method is necessary to inject our custom ModuleClassLoader into the ModuleSpec

      • addClasses

        public void addClasses(java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> classes)
        Manually add the compiled classes to this classloader. This method will not redefine the class, so that the class's classloader will continue to be compiler's classloader.

      • addClassBytes

        public java.lang.Class<?> addClassBytes(java.lang.String name,
                               byte[] classBytes)
        Manually add the compiled classes to this classloader. This method will define and resolve the class, binding this classloader to the class.
        Returns:
        the loaded class
